titles.title: Providing for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Seventh Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Requires that a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Seventh Congress be printed as a House document.
